PERSONA:
meet alex, a 35-year-old married man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region of the united states. he is a white non-hispanic citizen who immigrated to the country between 11 and 20 years ago from another country.

alex holds a postgraduate degree and is a college graduate. he identifies as a moderate roman catholic, although he seldom attends religious services. despite his religious affiliation, he is not a born-again or evangelical christian.

politically, alex aligns with the democratic party and considers himself a moderate or conservative democrat. he is a registered voter and is absolutely certain about his registration at his current address.

financially, alex falls into the middle-income tier, earning between $80,000 and $90,000 annually. he is an avid internet user, accessing it almost constantly.

in his free time, alex does not actively participate in volunteer work. however, he enjoys exploring the metropolitan area he resides in and immersing himself in the diverse cultural experiences it offers.

overall, alex is a well-educated, moderate, and civic-minded individual who values his religious and cultural roots while embracing the opportunities and perspectives available in his adopted country.
